tag_color_help.message: Colors helps to visually distinguish the different tags. Choose different colors for your tags: you'll see that it's very eye candy!

tag_module_help.message: It's possible to constrain the use of a tag to a module. But it's quite rare. If you don't understand, keep this entry empty!

tag_children_help.message:
Child tags allow you to hierarchically organize your tags and ease the tagging process.
For example, if you create a tag lake under a tag landscape, all the documents tagged with lake will also be tagged as landscape, automatically. When searching for landscape, the documents tagged with lake will be in the results.

tag_usertag_help.message:
Personnal tags can only be used by their creator.
You can create as many personnal tags as you want to organize the contents of your websites.
Warning! Once the tag created, this proprerty cannot be changed.

tag_usertag_cannot_be_modified.message: This property can only be defined when creating the tag.

selected_tags_message.message: selected tags are used to filter the list of items

why_use_tags.message: Les étiquettes vous servent à organiser vos contenus pour les classer et les retrouver plus facilement.
